transcript:
Customer: Hello?

Executive: Hello? Haan boliye.

Customer: Kya good evening sir? Hello.

Executive: Haan good evening boliye.

Customer: Haan Gopal bol raha hu IndiaMART se head office se. Sir subah call kiya tha aap busy the sir.

Executive: Yes busy tha.

Customer: Okay boliye. Subah morning hi call kiya tha aaj maine 10 baje kiya tha but you you are like looking busy that time.

Executive: Batao ji batao. To actually maine aapko jo message hai na padha nahi main thoda office mein thoda out tha.

Executive: Kaise sir?

Customer: Main office mein nahi hu. Theek hai?

Customer: Achha achha.

Customer: Iske liye. Ek bar dekh lijiye. To fir kya matlab aap kal iske liye gussa ho rahe the maine aapko time le call nahi kiya. One second one second one minute.

Customer: Hello. Kaise sir?

Executive: Abhi wo time hai na January tak hai na?

Customer: Sir wo plan dekha tha aapne sir usme kya samajh mein aaya aapko?

Executive: Haan haan theek hai main plan dekha hai thoda kuch dekha hai itna dhyan se nahi dekha hai. Nahi January tak hai na time?

Customer: January tak kab khatam ho raha hai?

Executive: Kab khatam ho raha hai?

Customer: Sir offer aapka abhi ka hai sir aap January ka kaise khatam ho raha hai matlab?

Executive: Main renewal kar renewal puch raha hu. Renewal kab khatam ho raha hai? Renewal to hai sir. Haan renewal to hai sir aapka ek mahine ka time hai but renewal pe to hum aapko jo suggest kar rahe hai na ye jo ye renewal offer nahi hai na sir. Renewal wo hota hai jisme aapka same services hota hai but hum jo main aapko quotation diya tha wo two plus one wala jo bata raha hu jo premium ka handle karoge basic plus premium. Ye aapko renewal chahiye to fir aap renewal pe ja sakte hai but us time pata nahi aapko availability nahi ho sakta hai. Kyunki ye pre renewal ka stage hai aapka renewal aane se pehle jo aap plan karoge usme milta hai. Aap koi bhi company mein ja ke dekhenge na to pre renewal pe hi milta hai.

Executive: Theek hai is aapko idea hai?

Customer: Nahi sir boliye kal to aap aaj ke liye bol rahe the na sir aaj aap bata denge.

Executive: Aap hi mujhe thoda ghumaya tha na. Arey jabhi main time bola tha aap phone nahi kiye aapka marzi se phone kiya hai. Aaj kiya tab to tumne kaha phone uthaya. Chalo chalo bhai jabhi mere ko chahiye main tabhi bata dunga theek hai aapka marzi se nahi hai na. Main keh raha hu aaj. Sun sun sun sun sun sun aap aap iske liye bol rahe sir aap logo ka tarika bahut achcha nahi hai. Chalo main bata dunga jabhi mere ko chahiye tabhi main batao aapne jab call karne ke liye bola tabhi to kiya hai na sir aaj kya aapne phone uthaya. Okay okay sir sir maine phone uthaya main aapko bataya main thoda busy hu subah ka time. Haan haan to fir maine iske baad sham ko kiya sir pareshan to nahi kiya aapko. Nahi nahi nahi nahi pareshan abhi aap aapka jo baat baat chit ka jo hai na tone hai tone ka hisab se main bata raha hu. Tone kharab hai. Maine abhi kuch aapko galat bola hai kya sir bataiye aap. Sir mera isme nahi recorded hai bhai. Theek hai? Voice recorded hai aap bhi voice recorded hai mera bhi voice recorded hai theek hai aap kaise baat karta hai uske upar main aapko main reply diya hai. Theek hai? Sir main aapko ye keh raha hu aap nahi nahi nahi nahi nahi suno suno main aapko teen din se ek minute main keh raha hu teen din se meri aapki baat chal rahi hai ek minute sir aisa nahi hai aap phone karo turant main payment de do nahi to renewal karo. Kya jabardasti hai kya?

Executive: Nahi aap kya kehna chahte hai sir ab mere ko batao aapko karna hai nahi karna hai wo alag baat hai sir lekin jo aapne jis time pe bola usi time pe to maine kiya hai.

Customer: Sir please thoda mere ko time de do ek hafta to de do. Aapka interest kya hai sir main janna chahta hu nahi aap kehte hai ki call karo fir kehte hai head office se karo head office se meri baat chal rahi hai aapse fir now you are saying ki Gopal main abhi nahi kar paunga main apni marzi se. I will contact you later not now.

Executive: No that's okay boss abhi aap ye keh rahe hai na ki sir dekho aap apne statement mein nahi hai sir aap bataiye. Main aapko bata raha hu main office mein nahi hu bahar hu.

Customer: Achha bahar hai to batao kal subah 10 baje call kar lu kya? Main aapko bata dunga kal nahi nahi do teen din mein monday monday monday kar le kal chutti hai na saturday hai. Ab monday mein aap sir aap batao sir aap jis time bolenge usi time main call karta hu. Main aapko turant phone karunga kyuki mere ko jo chahiye tabhi main turant aapko main phone karunga. Main main ye keh raha hu sir main ye keh raha hu if aapko monday bolenge to main aapko monday 10 baje karta hu to monday 10 baje hum payment kar le kya batao.

Executive: Sir dekho aisa businessman aisa businessman commitment aapke upar bhi chahiye hai na aapka jo commitment bilkul hona chahiye sir aap jo aapka jo tarika hai wo bhai sun lo sir mere ko bataiye na main galat kya kar raha hu sir. Nahi galat hai aap sabhi ko aise bolte hai sir aap aap sabhi ko aise bolte hai sir aap talking. Chalo theek hai theek hai okay. Sir.
summary:
Concerns:

- Wants to know the last date of offer.

- Customer says executive is not punctual.

- Customer feels pressured for immediate payment.



Resolution:

- Executive explained pre-renewal benefits.

- Executive said he will call when free.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will call the customer on Monday.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- renewal, payment, offer, commitment
